/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades adorned with colorful signs and advertisements that add a vibrant touch to the scene. Cars and buses are scattered throughout the street, hinting at the city's constant movement and energy. Trees and streetlights punctuate the scene, adding elements of nature and illumination to the urban setting.
